verses.name: Acts 5:4
verses.text: Whiles it remained, was it not thine own? and after it was sold, was it not in thine own power? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart? thou hast not lied unto men, but unto God.

verses.name: Acts 5:5
verses.text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down, and gave up the ghost: and great fear came on all them that heard these things.

verses.name: Acts 5:6
verses.text: And the young men arose, wound him up, and carried him out, and buried him.

verses.name: Acts 5:7
verses.text: And it was about the space of three hours after, when his wife, not knowing what was done, came in.
